Allentown.Mayfair (festival):
Mayfair Festival of the Arts is a multidisciplinary arts festival (visual arts, performing arts, garden arts, children's art, art education) formally produced by Mayfair Inc, a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization. The Festival is held annually in Allentown, Pennsylvania.
Mayfair Festival of the Arts has been a Lehigh Valley tradition since 1986 and it is making a comeback at Cedar Crest College.
